QuestData.Title: Surveying Cyphers
QuestData.Description:
There are many consoles such as that one scattered throughout Zereth Mortis.
They have all been beyond my understanding, but perhaps that creature intends to reveal their meaning to us?
Fortunately, I know where there are more. I will mark them on your map, and accompany you... for research, of course.
Let us see what this creature's purpose is.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Concordance consoles in Zereth Mortis.
QuestData.RewardText: You have gained a glimpse of knowledge unimaginable. Now, to make use of it.
